shared_text:
Lost Hills Sheriff's Station
January 18, 2019 at 6:02 PM ¬∑

Update for a very serious incident that was reported January 15, 2019 at Lost Hills Sheriff‚Äôs Station. On Tuesday January 15, the station received an attempt abduction/kidnapping report near Paul Revere Road, in the City of Calabasas. Patrol Deputies, Detectives and additional resources immediately began an investigation which resulted in a manhunt for a predator that was reported to have attempted to kidnap a 13 year old child.

Detectives conducted interviews of potential witnesses, canvassed the local area, and reviewed surveillance videos for information. After days of dedication to this incident, the 13 year old was re-interviewed, at which time detectives ultimately determined there was no crime and that the entire incident was a hoax.

We want our communities to know we take every threat or report serious and will investigate it and use as many resources available. The criminal report has been closed and we are not seeking any suspects.

Malibu Patch Calabasas Patch KCAL 9
